1.name: The Best Years of Our Lives
1.description: Three World War II veterans return home to small-town America to discover that they and their families have been irreparably changed.

2.name: It's a Wonderful Life
2.description: An angel is sent from Heaven to help a desperately frustrated businessman by showing him what life would have been like if he had never existed.

3.name: The Harvey Girls
3.description: On a train trip West to become a mail-order bride, Susan Bradley meets a cheery crew of young women travelling out to open a " Harvey House " restaurant at a remote whistle-stop.

4.name: The Big Sleep
4.description: Private detective Philip Marlowe is hired by a rich family. Before the complex case is over, he's seen murder, blackmail, and what might be love.

5.name: Notorious
5.description: A woman is asked to spy on a group of Nazi friends in South America. How far will she have to go to ingratiate herself with them?

6.name: I See a Dark Stranger
6.description: A young Irish woman hates England so much she becomes a Nazi spy.

7.name: Gilda
7.description: A small-time gambler hired to work in a Buenos Aires casino learns that his ex-lover is married to his employer.

8.name: The Stranger
8.description: An investigator from the War Crimes Commission travels to Connecticut to find an infamous Nazi.

9.name: Dragonwyck
9.description: A simple Connecticut farm girl is recruited by a distant relative, an aristocratic patroon, to be governess to his young daughter in his Hudson Valley mansion.

10.name: Song of the South
10.description: The kindly story-teller Uncle Remus tells a young boy stories about trickster Br'er Rabbit, who outwits Br'er Fox and slow-witted Br'er Bear.

11.name: The Blue Dahlia
11.description: An ex-bomber pilot is suspected of murdering his unfaithful wife.

12.name: The Beast with Five Fingers
12.description: In a turn-of-the-century Renaissance Italian mansion, its tyrannical owner, a one-handed, wheelchair-bound pianist, with a strong belief in the occult, is murdered.

13.name: A Matter of Life and Death
13.description: A British wartime aviator who cheats death must argue for his life before a celestial court.

14.name: My Darling Clementine
14.description: The Earps battle the Clantons at the OK Corral in Tombstone, Arizona.

15.name: The Killers
15.description: Hit men kill an unresisting victim, and investigator Reardon uncovers his past involvement with beautiful, deadly Kitty Collins.

16.name: Great Expectations
16.description: A humble orphan suddenly becomes a gentleman with the help of an unknown benefactor.

17.name: La belle et la bête
17.description: A beautiful young woman takes her father's place as the prisoner of a mysterious beast, who wishes to marry her.

18.name: The Postman Always Rings Twice
18.description: A married woman and a drifter fall in love, then plot to murder her husband.

19.name: Nocturne
19.description: In 1940s Los Angeles, when womanizing composer Keith Vincent is found dead, the inquest concludes it was a suicide but police detective Joe Warne isn't so sure.

20.name: Duel in the Sun
20.description: Beautiful half-breed Pearl Chavez becomes the ward of her dead father's first love and finds herself torn between her sons, one good and the other bad.

21.name: The Razor's Edge
21.description: An adventuresome young man goes off to find himself and loses his socialite fiancée in the process. But when he returns 10 years later, she will stop at nothing to get him back, even though she is already married.

22.name: The Strange Love of Martha Ivers
22.description: A man is reunited with his childhood friend and her husband, who believe he knows the truth about the death of her rich aunt years earlier.

23.name: Till the Clouds Roll By
23.description: Biography of songwriter, Broadway pioneer, Jerome Kern. Unable to find immediate success in the USA, Kern sought recognition abroad. He journeyed to England where his dreams of success became real and where he met his future wife Eva.

24.name: The Yearling
24.description: A boy persuades his parents to allow him to adopt a young deer, but what will happen if the deer misbehaves?

25.name: Cluny Brown
25.description: A free-spirited parlor maid and a Czech refugee surprise an English village with their unconventional ways.

26.name: The Spiral Staircase
26.description: In 1916, a shadowy serial killer is targeting women with "afflictions"; one night during a thunderstorm, the mute Helen feels menaced.

27.name: The Strange Woman
27.description: In 1820s New England beautiful but poor and manipulative Jenny Hager marries rich old man Isaiah Poster but also seduces his son and his company foreman.

28.name: Green for Danger
28.description: After the nurse who declares that a recent surgical death was a murder dies also, an enigmatic Scotland Yard inspector arrives to investigate.

29.name: Dressed to Kill
29.description: Sherlock Holmes sets out to discover why a trio of murderous villains, including a dangerously attractive female, are desperate to obtain three unassuming and inexpensive little music boxes.

30.name: Lady in the Lake
30.description: The lady editor of a crime magazine hires Philip Marlowe to find the wife of her boss. The private detective soon finds himself involved in murder.

31.name: The Jolson Story
31.description: This movie shows the idealized career of the singer Al Jolson, a little Jewish boy who goes against the will of his father in order to be in showbiz. He becomes a star, falls in love with a...                See full summary »

32.name: Paisà
32.description: The language barrier has tragic consequences in a series of unrelated stories set during the Italian Campaign of WWII.

33.name: The Crimson Ghost
33.description: A criminal mastermind known as the Crimson Ghost is out to steal a device called the Cyclotrode, which can short-circuit all electrical currents on the planet.

34.name: Bedlam
34.description: Nell Bowen, the spirited protege of rich Lord Mortimer, becomes interested in the conditions of notorious St. Mary's of Bethlehem Asylum (Bedlam). Encouraged by the Quaker Hannay, she tries...                See full summary »

35.name: The Time of Their Lives
35.description: Two ghosts who were mistakenly branded as traitors during the Revolutionary War return to 20th century New England to retrieve a letter from George Washington which would prove their ...                See full summary »

36.name: The Dark Mirror
36.description: A man is found murdered, with witnesses convinced about the woman they saw leaving his apartment. However, it becomes apparent that the woman has a twin, and finding out which one is the killer seems impossible.

37.name: Somewhere in the Night
37.description: George Taylor returns from WWII with amnesia. Back home in Los Angeles, while trying to track down his old identity, he stumbles onto a 3-year old murder case and a hunt for a missing $2 million.

38.name: Night and Day
38.description: A fictionalized biopic of composer Cole Porter from his days at Yale in the 1910s through the height of his success to the 1940s.

39.name: Terror by Night
39.description: When the fabled Star of Rhodesia diamond is stolen on a London to Edinburgh train and the son of its owner is murdered, Sherlock Holmes must discover which of his suspicious fellow passengers is responsible.

40.name: Deception
40.description: A piano teacher believes that her fiancé was killed on the battlefield. When he miraculously returns, they decide to marry, but are threatened by a wealthy, egotistical composer the piano teacher started dating on the rebound after she became convinced her love had died.

41.name: Make Mine Music
41.description: Animation done to contemporary popular music.

42.name: Dangerous Money
42.description: A treasury agent on the trail of counterfeit money confides to fellow ocean liner passenger Charlie Chan that there have been two attempts on his life.

43.name: A Night in Casablanca
43.description: The Marx Brothers are employed at a hotel in postwar Casablanca, where a ring of Nazis is trying to recover a cache of stolen treasure.

44.name: Anna and the King of Siam
44.description: In 1862, a young Englishwoman becomes royal tutor in Siam and befriends the King.

45.name: Shock
45.description: A psychologically distraught woman is committed to a private sanitarium by the man she witnessed commit a murder.

46.name: The Dark Corner
46.description: Secretary tries to help her boss, who is framed for a murder.

47.name: Angel on My Shoulder
47.description: The Devil arranges for a deceased gangster to return to Earth as a well-respected judge to make up for his previous life.

48.name: Cloak and Dagger
48.description: In WW2, the Allies race against time to persuade two nuclear scientists working for the Germans to switch sides.

49.name: The Chase
49.description: Chuck Scott gets a job as chauffeur to tough guy Eddie Roman; but Chuck's involvement with Eddie's fearful wife becomes a nightmare.

50.name: Nobody Lives Forever
50.description: Ex-GI Nick Blake gets involved in a scheme to fleece a rich, young widow, but finds himself falling for her, much to the displeasure of his racketeer cohorts.
